name: Vibhor Mungee
about_me: I am Vibhor, an ardent full stack developer, with 9+ years of IT experience, specializing in development of Frontend- Mobile (Android, iOS, Cross-platform), Web applications (React.js, Angular, Bootstrap) and Backend- Node.js and Express.js.
what_do_i_do: I enable teams to hit their key success metrics with my technical guidance and high- quality development. I have architect, designed, developed & maintained multiple software projects from the scratch to help solve real world problems. My skill ranges from developing simple websites that need to capture simple data, to huge and complex applications that deals with millions of users, to some out-of-the-box features.
